title: Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 6 slices bacon or Â½ lb chorizo
steps: Cook bacon until crisp (or brown chorizo). Chop or crumble.
Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in nonstick skillet over medium-low.
Add eggs. Stir constantly making soft curds. Remove slightly underdone.
Layer eggs, meat, cheese, avocado, salsa on each tortilla.
Optional: grill seam-side down for crispy outside.
